Websites & Multimedia

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

Competance Aims

  • Give an account of standards and principles that make the Internet possible.
  • Plan websites that contain multimedia components.
  • Develop websites according to plan, and evaluate if requirements for user interfaces have been satisfied.
  • Edit websites by using standardized mark-up language.
  • Organize and give grounds for the file structure(s) of websites.
  • Set up demands for, and evaluate, websites.

User Interface

What is UI?

A user interface enables a human to communicate with something. This can be a car, a radio, or in this case, a website.

What is a good UI?

A good UI gives the user the possibiility to use the website in an intutive way. That is to say that the user will quickly understand how they should use the site.
